column4: help, i just bought a nvidia fx5200 128mb, it lags so badly with cedega, even while playing vice city
it should work with vice city
a 64mb plays vice city real smooth
yeah, you installed the nvidia proprietary drivers, right?
it's not a general slowness issue, like glxgears runs fine?
problem is the dodgy d3d-to-opengl translation of cedega and wine
so there's nothing i can do about it
no, i'm not saying that is THE problem
just it's an annoying thing that complicates matters :P
not sure why changing cards caused that, there's probably a solution
yep, any idea what i could do? ive tried the nvidia-glx pkg, that did not work, and now im on nvidia's latest driver
have you tried using wine instead to run vice city?
